languages.text: Фактор прибыли (ФП) — это показатель богатства и власти Вольного Торговца, определяемый совокупностью доходов, объемом казны и положением в обществе. Фактор прибыли заменяет собой валюту и используется для любых приобретений Вольного Торговца — от гранат до улучшений планетарных колоний. Фактор прибыли не расходуется при совершении покупок и служит индикатором доступа к различным приобретениям и возможностям.

Profit factor (PF) is a measure of a Rogue Trader's wealth and power, the aggregated value of their income, treasury reserves, and exalted status. Profit factor acts as a replacement for conventional currency and is used for all of the Rogue Trader's purchases from grenades to planetary improvements. Buying items does not reduce your profit factor. Rather, its value serves as a threshold that determines your access to certain purchases and opportunities.
languages.original_text: Фактор прибыли (ФП) — это показатель богатства и власти Вольного Торговца, определяемый совокупностью доходов, объемом казны и положением в обществе. Фактор прибыли заменяет собой валюту и используется для любых приобретений Вольного Торговца — от гранат до улучшений планетарных колоний. Фактор прибыли не расходуется при совершении покупок и служит индикатором доступа к различным приобретениям и возможностям.

traits.locale_text: Profit factor (PF) is a measure of a Rogue Trader's wealth and power, the aggregated value of their income, loans, treasury reserves, and exalted status. Profit factor acts as a replacement for conventional currency and is used for all of the Rogue Trader's purchases from grenades to planetary improvements. Buying items does not reduce your profit factor. Rather, its value serves as a threshold that determines your access to certain purchases and opportunities.

Buying items does not reduce your profit factor. Rather, its value serves as a threshold that determines your access to certain purchases and opportunities.

languages.text: Profitfaktor (PF) ist ein Maß für den Reichtum und die Macht eines Freihändlers, eine Kombination aus Einkünften, Schatzkammerrücklagen und sozialem Ansehen. Profitfaktor ersetzt konventionelle Währung und wird für alle Anschaffungen des Freihändlers verwendet, von Granaten bis hin zu planetaren Verbesserungen. Der Kauf von Gegenständen verringert deinen Profitfaktor nicht. Er dient vielmehr als Schwelle, die deinen Zugang zu bestimmten Anschaffungen und Gelegenheiten bestimmt.
languages.original_text: Profit factor (PF) is a measure of a Rogue Trader's wealth and power, the aggregated value of their income, treasury reserves, and exalted status. Profit factor acts as a replacement for conventional currency and is used for all of the Rogue Trader's purchases from grenades to planetary improvements. Buying items does not reduce your profit factor. Rather, its value serves as a threshold that determines your access to certain purchases and opportunities.

Der Kauf von Gegenständen verringert deinen Profitfaktor nicht. Er dient vielmehr als Schwelle, die deinen Zugang zu bestimmten Anschaffungen und Gelegenheiten bestimmt.

languages.text: Le facteur d'influence (FI) permet de mesurer la richesse et la puissance d'un libre-marchand, la valeur totale de ses revenus, de ses réserves de trésorerie et de son statut d'exalté. Le facteur d'influence remplace la monnaie conventionnelle et est utilisé pour tous les achats du libre-marchand, des grenades aux améliorations planétaires. L'achat d'objets ne réduit pas votre facteur d'influence. Au contraire, sa valeur sert de seuil afin de déterminer votre accès à certains achats et opportunités.
languages.original_text: Profit factor (PF) is a measure of a Rogue Trader's wealth and power, the aggregated value of their income, treasury reserves, and exalted status. Profit factor acts as a replacement for conventional currency and is used for all of the Rogue Trader's purchases from grenades to planetary improvements. Buying items does not reduce your profit factor. Rather, its value serves as a threshold that determines your access to certain purchases and opportunities.

traits.locale_text: Le facteur d'influence (FI) permet de mesurer la richesse et la puissance d'un libre-marchand, la valeur totale de ses revenus, de ses réserves de trésorerie et de son statut d'exalté. Le facteur d'influence remplace la monnaie conventionnelle et est utilisé pour tous les achats du libre-marchand, des grenades aux améliorations planétaires. L'achat d'objets ne réduit pas votre facteur d'influence. Au contraire, sa valeur sert de seuil afin de déterminer votre accès à certains achats et opportunités.

languages.text: 利润因子代表行商浪人的财富、权力、收入、国库储备与尊贵地位的总值。 在买卖过程中，利润因子会代替传统货币来发挥作用。行商浪人可以使用利润因子来购买一切物品，从手雷到行星升级设备不等。 购买物品不会消耗利润因子。利润因子代表某种阈值，决定您是否能购买某些东西，或是否会遇到某种机遇。
languages.original_text: Profit factor (PF) is a measure of a Rogue Trader's wealth and power, the aggregated value of their income, treasury reserves, and exalted status. Profit factor acts as a replacement for conventional currency and is used for all of the Rogue Trader's purchases from grenades to planetary improvements. Buying items does not reduce your profit factor. Rather, its value serves as a threshold that determines your access to certain purchases and opportunities.

traits.locale_text: 利润因子代表行商浪人的财富、权力、收入、国库储备与尊贵地位的总值。 在买卖过程中，利润因子会代替传统货币来发挥作用。行商浪人可以使用利润因子来购买一切物品，从手雷到行星升级设备不等。 购买物品不会消耗利润因子。利润因子代表某种阈值，决定您是否能购买某些东西，或是否会遇到某种机遇。

languages.text: El factor de beneficio (FB) es un cálculo de las riquezas y el poder de un Comerciante Independiente, el valor total de sus ingresos, reservas de tesorería y exaltación. El factor de beneficio sustituye los métodos de pago convencionales y sirve para realizar todas las transacciones de un Comerciante Independiente, desde granadas hasta mejores planetarias. Tu factor de beneficio no se reduce al comprar objetos. Por el contrario, su valor actúa como una suerte de límite que determina tu acceso a determinadas compras y oportunidades.
languages.original_text: Profit factor (PF) is a measure of a Rogue Trader's wealth and power, the aggregated value of their income, treasury reserves, and exalted status. Profit factor acts as a replacement for conventional currency and is used for all of the Rogue Trader's purchases from grenades to planetary improvements. Buying items does not reduce your profit factor. Rather, its value serves as a threshold that determines your access to certain purchases and opportunities.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:ProfitFactor}factor de beneficio{/g} (FB) es un cálculo de las riquezas y el poder de un Comerciante Independiente, el valor total de sus ingresos, préstamos, reservas de tesorería y exaltación. El factor de beneficio sustituye los métodos de pago convencionales y sirve para realizar todas las transacciones de un Comerciante Independiente, desde granadas hasta mejores planetarias. Tu factor de beneficio no se reduce al comprar objetos. Por el contrario, su valor actúa como una suerte de límite que determina tu acceso a determinadas compras y oportunidades.

languages.original_text: The Profit Factor (PF) is a measure of a Free Trader's wealth and power, a combination of monthly income, treasury size, social standing, available loans and borrowing. RP replaces currency and is used for any of the Free Merchant's acquisitions, from grenades to planetary colonies. FP is not spent, but is used as a level of access to certain acquisitions and checks.

languages.text: 利益因子（PF）はローグトレーダーの富と力を表す尺度であり、収入、宝物庫の貯蔵品、およびエグザルテッドステータスの総計である。 利益因子は従来の通貨の代わりとして、グレネードから惑星修繕まで全ての購買活動に使用されている。 アイテムの購入で減ることはないが、これを基本値として特定の購入品やチャンスが得られることもある。
languages.original_text: Profit factor (PF) is a measure of a Rogue Trader's wealth and power, the aggregated value of their income, treasury reserves, and exalted status. Profit factor acts as a replacement for conventional currency and is used for all of the Rogue Trader's purchases from grenades to planetary improvements. Buying items does not reduce your profit factor. Rather, its value serves as a threshold that determines your access to certain purchases and opportunities.

languages.text: Kâr faktörü (KF), Hür Tacir'in servet ve gücünün ölçüsü; gelirlerinin, hazine rezervlerinin ve toplumdaki konumunun bir birleşimidir. Kâr faktörü, geleneksel para biriminin yerine geçer ve bombalardan gezegen geliştirmelerine dek Hür Tacir'in tüm satın alımlarında kullanılır. Eşya satın almak kâr faktörünü azaltmaz. Değeri daha çok belirli satın alım işlemlerine ve fırsatlara erişebilmene olanak tanıyan bir eşik görevi görür.
